alert.note: Alert for Debeque to Silt Corridor; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 1:53PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Garfield County through 230 PM MDT... At 153 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles northwest of Parachute, or 35 miles north of Grand Junction, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Garfield County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Debeque to Silt Corridor; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus
